fact.description: The match has started at Estadio das Dunas.
Jonas Eriksson signals a USA throw-in in Ghana's half.
Goal! Clint Dempsey gives USA a 0-1 lead.
Ghana awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a USA goal kick.
Ball safe as USA is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Ghana.
John Boye (Ghana) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for USA at Estadio das Dunas.
USA to take a throw-in in Ghana territory.
Can USA get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ghana's half?
USA are coming forward and Jozy Altidore gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ghana have a goal kick.
USA awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ghana to take a throw-in in USA territory.
Jonas Eriksson blows against Ghana's Asamoah Gyan for offside.
Throw-in USA.
Can Ghana get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in USA's half?

Throw-in for Ghana at Estadio das Dunas.
Ghana's Christian Atsu is whistled for offside at Estadio das Dunas.

Ghana to take a throw-in in USA territory.

Jonas Eriksson signals a free kick to USA in their own half.
Jonas Eriksson signals a free kick to Ghana.
USA push forward at Estadio das Dunas and Jozy Altidore gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Ghana defence.
Ghana have a dangerous throw-in.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Jozy Altidore.
Play is underway once more.
Jozy Altidore, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Aron Johannsson is the substitute for USA.
Corner awarded to Ghana.
In Natal, John Boye (Ghana) misses the target with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a USA goal kick.
Jonas Eriksson signals a free kick to USA in their own half.
USA are pushing forward but Alejandro Bedoya's finish is wide of the goal.
Jonas Eriksson awards Ghana a goal kick.
Ghana have been awarded a corner by Jonas Eriksson.
Can Ghana get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in USA's half?
USA have a goal kick.
Free kick Ghana.
Christian Atsu (Ghana) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ghana's Christian Atsu breaks free at Estadio das Dunas. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for USA at Estadio das Dunas.
Jonas Eriksson signals a free kick to Ghana.
Throw-in for Ghana at Estadio das Dunas.
Mohammed Rabiu (Ghana) has received a first yellow card.
Jonas Eriksson signals a Ghana throw-in in USA's half.
Ball safe as USA is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Clint Dempsey is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.

USA have a goal kick.
Aron Johannsson gets his shot on target but fails to score for USA.
USA awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can USA get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ghana's half?
Jonas Eriksson signals a free kick to USA just outside Ghana's area.
USA have been awarded a corner by Jonas Eriksson.
USA to take a throw-in in Ghana territory.
Jonas Eriksson signals a free kick to Ghana.
5 minutes will be added to the first half.
Jonas Eriksson signals a Ghana throw-in in USA's half.
Corner awarded to Ghana.
Important block from the USA defence as Jordan Pierre Ayew fires in a strike for Ghana.
The first-half has ended.
John Anthony Brooks is replacing Matt Besler for USA at Estadio das Dunas.
Jonas Eriksson signals a USA throw-in in Ghana's half.

In Natal Ghana attack through Kevin Prince Boateng. The finish is off target, however.

The match has come to a close in Natal. The final score is 1-2.
